title: उत्तर प्रदेश में हिंदू युवा वाहिनी द्वारा पादरी का उत्पीड़न? नहीं, यह 2016 की घटना है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: This is India… In Uttar Pradesh a Christian pastor is being given a donkey ride after shaving his head in half. This inhuman act was done by the activists of a youth organization, Hindu Yuvavahini Bajrag Dal founded by Yogi Adityanath pic.twitter.com/9fctTbvC9y
